fixes.name: Select Year
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau parameter reference [Parameters].[Select Year] with SELECTEDVALUE('Select Year'[Display As]) and converted the column reference [Year] to 'dictionary+'[Year]. The expression evaluates the comparison as a measure because it depends on a parameter.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[Select Year]); per rules, any parameter-based calculation must be created as a measure.
